location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas Hodges, Governor at Bombay, and Daniel Draper, James Ryley, Benjamin Jervis, Thomas Mostyn, and Nathaniel Stackhouse, all part of the Council at Bombay Castle, to James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green

mods.abstract: The letter discusses shipments of stationery and the sales strategy of selling perpets only with broadcloth in equal part.
